overview:
Specialist experience in working with start up companies using technology convergence to help shape the social and business worlds across the globe

Fifteen years experience of delivering tailor-made recruitment solutions across the technology industry with a high level of flexibility, alacrity, accuracy and passion.

Specialties

Big Data - Data Science - Predictive Analytics - Growth Hackers - NLP - Machine Learning - Education 2.0 - SaaS - PaaS - IaaS - Social Media - Semantic Web 3.0 - Enterprise 2.0 - Mobile 2.0 - E Commerce - M Commerce,Green & Clean Tech, Cloud, Music 2.0, Digital Agencies, Microsharing, Online Gaming, ….Hover Boards, Personal Jet Packs…. and the next big thing….probably.Â
